words.source: H6213 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'did', ESV 'did', NASB 'did'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H1697 prep. k- + n.ms construct davar 'word'; KJV 'according to the word of', ESV 'as Moses had asked', NASB 'according to the word of'
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H5493 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of סוּר 'to turn aside, remove'; KJV 'removed', ESV 'removed', NASB 'removed'
H6157 art. + n.ms ʿarov 'swarm (of flies)'; KJV 'the swarms of flies', ESV 'the swarms of flies', NASB 'the swarms of insects'
H6547 prep. min + proper name; KJV 'from Pharaoh', ESV 'from Pharaoh', NASB 'from Pharaoh'
H5650 prep. min + n.mp construct ʿeved 'servant' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'from his servants', ESV 'from his servants', NASB 'from his servants'
H5971 conj. + prep. min + n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'and from his people', ESV 'and from his people', NASB 'and from his people'
H3808 neg. particle loʾ 'not'; KJV 'there remained not', ESV 'not', NASB 'not'
H7604 Niphal perf. 3ms of שָׁאַר 'to remain, be left'; KJV 'remained', ESV 'remained', NASB 'remained'
H259 num.ms ʾechad 'one'; KJV 'one', ESV 'one', NASB 'one'
